presentationColumns.name: Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines amount for line category as order.

presentationColumns.name: Return Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines amount for line category as return.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Return Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Open Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines amount for line category as order for open sales orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Open Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Return Lines Open Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines amount for line category as return for open sales orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Return Lines Open Amount

presentationColumns.name: Return Lines Closed Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines amount for line category as return for closed sales orders.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Return Lines Closed Amount

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines which are shipped.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Shipped Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Billed Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines billing amount for line category as order.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Billed Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Past Due Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines where scheduled ship date is less than system date and line are not shipped and for line category as order.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Past Due Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: On Time Shipment Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines which are shipped on time.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.On Time Shipment Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines which are perfect order lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Perfect Order Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Perfect Order Lines Amount %
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows Perfect Order Line Amount percentage to overall Sale Order Fulfilment Line Amount for a given period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Perfect Order Lines Amount %

presentationColumns.name: Late Shipped Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines which are not shipped on time.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Late Shipped Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Lines Shipped in Full Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines which are shipped in full.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Lines Shipped in Full Amount

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Lines Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amount for lines which are cancelled.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Cancelled Lines Amount

presentationColumns.name: Lines On Holds Open Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of lines amount for sales orders which are on hold and fulfilment lines are open.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Lines On Holds Open Amount

presentationColumns.name: Unit List Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of unit list price.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Unit List Price

presentationColumns.name: Unit Selling Price
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as average of unit selling price.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - OM Sales Orders.Unit Selling Price
